copyError-msg: There was an error. Please, copy the code manually.
defaultDescription-msg: We will add a small description about this EUC soon.
noWheel-msg: We don't have this EUC in our database.
errorLoadingLikes-msg: There was an error while loading likes' system. Please, try again later.
errorLoadingComments-msg: There was an error while loading comments' system. Please, try again later.
newModels-msg: This website only shows the newest and most powerful versions of each EUC provided by the manufacturer.
olderVersions-msg: That means, older and/or less powerful versions (even if they are sold nowadays) won't be shown in this website.
displayedSpeed-msg: All EUCs mentioned in this website are sold with a limited top speed of {{speed}}.
modifySpeed-msg: In order to reach speeds mentioned in this website some custom modifications for that wheel are needed.
displayedRange-msg: Displayed range in this website is based in a more realistic EUCs usage.
usageExamples-msg: This includes hard accelerations, hard breaking, go up ramps, jumping or keeping hight speeds during prolonged periods of time.
information-msg: about models, speed and ranges displayed.
disclaimer1-msg: This website is not related nor depends on any of the stores that can be shown.
disclaimer2-msg: However, some of the links shown can be sponsored by some of these stores.
noWheels-msg: There are no EUCs that match your search criterias.
changeFilters-msg: Relax or reset the filters to find some options that is close to what you are looking for.
noWheelsToCompare-msg: There are not enough EUCs to compare.
addWheelsToCompare-msg: Please, add more EUCs to your comparison to see the results.
unusedSpec-msg: This is not used for calculations
wheelAddedToComparator-msg: {{wheel}} has been added to the Comparator.
confirmation-msg: This means {{appName}} is not responsible for anything you do in {{storeName}}'s site.
manualDiscount-msg: If you want to get a {{discount}}% discount, you need to manually enter this code when you are proccesing your payment:
settingsSpecWeights-msg: Here you can modify your priorities regarding the EUCs features. These changes will change how each EUC is scored in the comparator.
settingsSpecWeightsPresets-msg: You can choose one of the predefined settings that best suits your preferences.
settingsSpecWeightsCustom-msg: If none of the presets suit your preferences, here you can meticulously customize how each feature is scored.
newVideos-title: New videos since your last visit
noVideos-msg: There are no videos that match your search criterias.
changeVideoFilters-msg: Relax or reset the filters to find some options that is close to what you are looking for.
dealers1-msg: One of {{appName}}'s added values is that we gather purchase links from the larger dealers in {{region}}, so you can access to a safe dealers' list in your region.
dealers2-msg: Also, in order to make it easier to you, our app fetches these distributors' prices and availability, to offer you the best possible purchase.
noDealers-msg: We don't have agreements or dealers in {{region}}
discounts1-msg: If that's not enough, we have agreements with some of those dealers, to offer you discounts if you use our codes.
discounts2-msg: These codes will be shown to you when available, when you click each dealer's <Buy> button.
name: Name
